entry.p: Since my post earlier today, I've been thinking about ways to improve my personal productivity. Here's one approach I've come up with:

ul.li: Devote the morning hours to my highest priority tasks for the day.
Don't check email, read news, or log into IM until after lunch.
At the end of each day, formulate a short list of priority tasks for the next morning.

entry.p: I may try this next week.
